products.title: Capri Vision Sunset Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Capri vision sunset day and night blind in orange. Made to measure from 31.24 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bring warmth and cheerful colour to your space with this striking orange toned window blind. The capri vision sunset day and night roller blind will benefit your space in more ways than one. The stylish design and on-trend colourway personalise your space whilst the horizontal striped design provides the perfect combination of shading and privacy.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1853 fabric colour: sunset material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.productdescription:
Draw your scheme together with this cheerful fabric window blind. The capri vision ochre day and night roller blind is sure to make an impact on your space thanks to the bright ochre yellow hue and practical functionality. This blind is designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst filling your interior with natural light.
